unnormalised: So, Mr. Sharma from accounts thinks he's the "CFO-in-training" after attending one (1) webinar? Hilarious! Last I checked, 'CFO' doesn't stand for "Chief Fry-cook of Office samosas." Maybe he should stick to excel sheets instead of trying to boss around the actual CEO, Ms. Kapoor. She's earned that title, not googled it, unlike SOME people!
normalised: So, Mister Sharma from accounts thinks he's the C-F-O-in-training after attending one webinar? Hilarious! Last I checked, C-F-O doesn't stand for "Chief Fry-cook of Office samosas." Maybe he should stick to excel sheets instead of trying to boss around the actual C-E-O, Missus Kapoor. She's earned that title, not googled it, unlike SOME people!
